Title: A Guiding Thread
Description:
<The words on the parchment appear burned, not written. A venomous tang singes your nose.>

Blind and alone, you stumble in the dark. I offer you a thread to cling to.

Follow it, should you wish to find your allies.
RewardText:
So you followed my guiding line to its terminus. 

For both of our sakes, I am glad that your zeal outpaces your survival instinct.
